critique: The document expresses sadness and anger regarding anti-Semitism, particularly in the context of the Hamas attacks and the perceived failure to protect Jewish students. There is also a sense of determination to combat anti-Semitism, but this does not necessarily translate to joy. There is a mild element of surprise at the extent of the problem, but it is not a dominant emotion. Disgust is present due to the description of vile anti-Semitic acts. Fear is present due to the description of violence against Jewish students.
